channel.title: Error questions
channel.description:
All right some times I get these errors
[code]exception encoutered while parsing incoming packets from (playername)[/code] and then theres a lot of java.net socketinputstream's
Also
[code]Fatal: couldn't find connection vortex! dropping packet[/code]. and then it disconnects them whats this mean?
Also does anyone know deltas save uhh thing (forget what its called) Because I Tried to do thread per client and I got errors with the PlayerSave in the IOClient. Saying couldn't find symbol

item.title: Error questions
item.dc:creator: @Magic_Shroom Magic Shroom
item.description:
@Magic_Shroom wrote:

All right some times I get these errors

exception encoutered while parsing incoming packets from (playername) and then theres a lot of java.net socketinputstream’s

Also

Fatal: couldn't find connection vortex! dropping packet. and then it disconnects them whats this mean?

Also does anyone know deltas save uhh thing (forget what its called) Because I Tried to do thread per client and I got errors with the PlayerSave in the IOClient. Saying couldn’t find symbol
